metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13112 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libexif before 0.6.22. Several buffer over-reads in EXIF MakerNote handling could lead to information disclosure and crashes. This is different from CVE-2020-0093.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13112` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-2ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-2ubuntu0.5').
